data_variables.name: color
data_variables.description: A string variable representing the user's favorite color.

data_variables.name: pi
data_variables.description: A float variable representing the approximate value of pi (3.14159).

data_variables.name: diameter
data_variables.description: An integer variable representing the diameter of a circle.

data_variables.name: radius
data_variables.description: A float variable representing the radius of a circle, calculated as half of the diameter.

data_variables.name: area
data_variables.description: A float variable representing the area of a circle, calculated using the formula pi times radius squared.

data_variables.name: a
data_variables.description: A list variable storing integer values [1, 2, 3].

data_variables.name: b
data_variables.description: A list variable storing integer values [3, 2, 1].

data_variables.name: to_smash
data_variables.description: An integer variable representing the number of candies that will be smashed based on the total candies collected.

data_variables.name: alice_candies
data_variables.description: An integer variable representing the number of candies collected by Alice.

data_variables.name: bob_candies
data_variables.description: An integer variable representing the number of candies collected by Bob.

data_variables.name: carol_candies
data_variables.description: An integer variable representing the number of candies collected by Carol.

data_flow.creation: Direct assignment with the approximate value.
data_flow.flow: Used in the calculation of the area.

data_flow.creation: Direct assignment with a fixed value.
Calculated using the formula pi * radius^2.

data_flow.flow: Used in swapping values with b.
Used in swapping values with a.

data_flow.creation: Calculated with the modulo operation on total candies.
data_flow.flow: Checked with q4.check() to verify correctness.

data_flow.creation: Direct assignment with a fixed value.
data_flow.flow: Part of the calculation for to_smash.

data_flow.creation: Direct assignment with a fixed value.
data_flow.flow: Part of the calculation for to_smash.

data_flow.creation: Direct assignment with a fixed value.
data_flow.flow: Part of the calculation for to_smash.
